column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"You need a Synthesizer each time
you make an element upgrade, but it's worth
the boost to the element value you'll get."

"Of course, there are limits to element values.
With the current technology, it maxes out at
50, so that's what I want you to shoot for."

"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old days, when I somehow managed to
get a Synthesizer jammed in myâ€¦"
